snippet: STOTZKY--Guenther, world-renowned soil biochemist, microbial ecologist and NYU Professor Emeritus died on April 11, 2015 at the age of 83 in Greenport, NY. Guenther was predeceased by his wife Kayla B. Stotzky and had three children, Jay, Martha, and Deborah Stotzky. As a scientist, colleague, friend, humanitarian, prankster, animal lover, fishing buddy and loving father, grandfather and great-grandfather, Guenther was unconditionally loved and is profoundly missed. 1/3
lead_paragraph: STOTZKY--Guenther, world-renowned soil biochemist, microbial ecologist and NYU Professor Emeritus died on April 11, 2015 at the age of 83 in Greenport, NY. Guenther was predeceased by his wife Kayla B. Stotzky and had three children, Jay, Martha, and Deborah Stotzky. As a scientist, colleague, friend, humanitarian, prankster, animal lover, fishing buddy and loving father, grandfather and great-grandfather, Guenther was unconditionally loved and is profoundly missed. 1/3
